short_summary: The Department of National Defence has a requirement to purchase 36 laser printers.
description: purchase and delivery of laser printers for the Department of National Defence
full_summary:
Get Ready to Bid
================

### Bidding Start

Here are the details of the contract bid announced by Government of Canada, Shared Services Canada for 36 laser printers.

### Tender Notice

The Department of National Defence has announced a tender for the supply and delivery of 36 laser printers. This contract covers the procurement of the necessary equipment.

### Tender Details

  | **Attribute** | **Value** |
  | --- | --- |
  | Title  | SSC 2BP2-132322 - Laser Printers for the Department of National Defence - Amendment 002 |
  | Original Publication Date  | February 2, 2023 |
  | Tender Closing Date  | February 17, 2023, 2:00 PM EDT |
  | Amendment Number  | 2 |
  | Solicitation Number  | BPM018127/21763 |
  | Expected Contract Start Date  | N/A |
  | Expected Contract End Date  | N/A |
  | Tender Status  | Expired |

### Solicitation Number and Reference Number

* Solicitation number: BPM018127/21763
* Reference number: SSC-23-00021763:T

### Product Details

* SNS Code: JX7025AJ, N3610C
* Description: Printers, Page, Laser - Maintenance, Printing Equipment

### Contracting Entity

* Contracting Entity: Shared Services Canada
* Address: 90 Metcalfe Street, Ottawa, ON, K0A 0C3 Canada
* Region: Quebec (excluding National Capital Region)

### Procurement Details

* Procurement Method: Competitive - Open bidding
* Procurement Category: Goods
* Trade Agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Regions of Opportunity: World
* Regions of Delivery: Quebec (excluding National Capital Region)

### Additional Information

A detailed description of the tender can be found in the Tender Notice documents uploaded to the Shared Services Canada website. The link to download these documents is provided below:

#### Attachment

* https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download/56A7B1E4-70BF-4AC1-8876-27FC8CD47C4A (and many other about 7 links in here)

You can contact Jesse Squirrell at 613-791-6257 or jesse.squirrell@ssc-spc.gc.ca for any further information. 

Investors, always check
